sentences.en: Adoption can fail for all kinds of reasons.
sentences.cn: 收养不成功可能有各种原因。

sentences.en: Be here at noon without fail.
sentences.cn: 一定在正午时到这里

sentences.en: Emergency cooling systems could fail and a reactor meltdown could occur.
sentences.cn: 紧急冷却系统有可能失灵，核反应堆有可能发生堆芯熔毁。

sentences.en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentences.cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentences.en: He wanted to make amends for causing their marriage to fail.
sentences.cn: 他导致了他们的婚姻破裂，因此想作出补偿。

sentences.en: He was afraid the revolution they had started would fail.
sentences.cn: 他担心他们发起的大变革会遭遇失败。

sentences.en: He won't allow himself to fail.
sentences.cn: 他不会任由自己失败的。

sentences.en: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.cn: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.en: If all else fails, you may be advised to have an operation.
sentences.cn: 要是其他方法都不见效的话，恐怕你还是动手术的好。

sentences.en: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.cn: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.en: It'sthe difference between a pass and a fail.
sentences.cn: 这是及格和不及格的差别.

sentences.en: Many of Britain's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 英国许多海滩连最起码的卫生标准都达不倒。

sentences.en: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.cn: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.en: Some manage it. Some fail miserably.
sentences.cn: 有些人成功了，而有些人则遭遇惨败。

sentences.en: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.cn: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

sentences.en: The government are failing in their duty to protect people.
sentences.cn: 该政府未能尽到保护人民的责任。

sentences.en: The government are failing in their duty to protect people. ＃
sentences.cn: 该政府未能尽到保护人民的责任。

sentences.en: The movie's special effects fail to dazzle.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的特效未能出彩。

sentences.en: The project could fail if there is inadequate follow-through.
sentences.cn: 如果缺少恰当的后续行动，该项目可能失败。

sentences.en: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere.
sentences.cn: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

sentences.en: Their antics never fail to amuse.
sentences.cn: 他们滑稽的举止总是让人发笑。

sentences.en: This magnificent church cannot fail to stop you in your tracks.
sentences.cn: 这座宏伟的教堂一定会让你止步赞叹。

sentences.en: Tomorrow without fail he would be at the old riverside warehouse.
sentences.cn: 明天他一定会在河边的旧仓库里。

words.tran_cn: 失败，不成功（fail的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 一定，必定：没有失败的可能

trans.tran_en: an unsuccessful result in a test or examination

trans.tran_cn: 失败，没有做，出故障，倒闭，衰弱，不够，不及格
trans.tran_en: to not succeed in achieving something
